company.name: Correlation One
company.description:
We transform workforces today to power the data economy of tomorrow.

Correlation One helps enterprises close data and digital skill gaps to develop talent for the jobs of tomorrow. We are committed to helping enterprises future-proof their workforces and create a more diverse data ecosystem through global programs like our Data Science for All (DS4A) initiative, custom enterprise training, and data competitions.
